price: Kisha tukawatimizia miadi, na tukawaokoa wao na tulio wataka, na tukawateketeza walio pita mipaka.
arabic: ثُمَّ صَدَقۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡوَعۡدَ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَمَن نَّشَآءُ وَأَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
footnotes: Kisha tukawatimizia na tukawahakikishia ahadi, na tukawaokoa wao na pamoja nao tukawaokoa tulio taka kuwaokoa miongoni mwa Waumini. Na makafiri walio vuka mipaka tuliwaangamiza kwa kukadhibisha kwao na kuukataa Ujumbe wa Manabii wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣadaqnāhumu al-waʿda fa-anjaynāhum waman nashāu wa-ahlaknā al-mus'rifīna
